Rulings.Base:
1. Discarding all cards in your hand is a cost.
2. "Infernity Reflector" targets the "Infernity" monster sent to your GY.
3. You can activate "Infernity Reflector" even if "Des Wombat" or "Prime Material Dragon" is face-up on the field. You cannot activate it if "Vanity's Fiend" is face-up on the field.
4. Special Summoning and inflicting damage occur at the same time.
